section.96: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Allah's Messenger (ï·º) used to perform the `Asr prayer and then one could reach the `Awali (a place in the outskirts of Medina) while the sun was still quite high. Narrated Yunus: The distance of the `Awali (from Medina) was four or three miles
